mapper.update:
update USER
GROWTHLEVELID = #{GROWTHLEVELID,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
HOMEADDRESSID = #{HOMEADDRESSID,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ROLEID = #{ROLEID,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REGISTERID = #{REGISTERID,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

HEADADDRESS = #{HEADADDRESS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NICKNAME = #{NICKNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOOD = #{MOOD,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where USERID = #{USERID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update USER set GROWTHLEVELID = #{GROWTHLEVELID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOMEADDRESSID = #{HOMEADDRESSID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ROLEID = #{ROLEID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REGISTERID = #{REGISTERID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, AGE = #{AGE,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HEADADDRESS = #{HEADADDRESS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NICKNAME = #{NICKNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOOD = #{MOOD,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where USERID = #{USERID,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
